Package com.noctarius.borabora.spi

This package contains interfaces and classes to build that basic internals of borabora, including common Value implementations and support classes like EqualsSupport.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    StreamableIterable<T>
    The StreamableIterable interface extends the common Iterable with Java 8 stream supporting methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractStreamValue
    The AbstractStreamValue is an abstract class implementing the basics for all stream backed Value implementations, working on a QueryContext.
    AbstractValue
    The AbstractValue abstract class is supposed to be the base class for all Value implementations.
    EqualsSupport
    The EqualsSupport class provides a utility method to find out if two elements are equal to each other.
    ObjectValue
    The ObjectValue class implements a Value type which is backed by a value object.
    RelocatableStreamValue
    The RelocatableStreamValue class implements a special version of a stream based Value type.
    StreamValue
    The StreamValue class is the actual, standard implementation of a stream based Value.
    ValueValidators
    The ValueValidators class provides a set of helper methods to quickly test values for a specific criteria.

Package com.noctarius.borabora.spi Description

This package contains interfaces and classes to build that basic internals of borabora, including common Value implementations and support classes like EqualsSupport.
